DataElement.preferredName: Local Recurrent Neoplasm Post Previous Therapeutic Procedure present Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No/Unknown indicator whether a local recurrence post previous treatment is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Local Recurrent Neoplasm Post Previous Therapeutic Procedure present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Progression; advancement in extent or severity._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Of or belonging to a restricted area on the body in relation to a point of origin._The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission._The time period following a point or another period of time. (NCI)_Occurring prior to something else. (NCI)_Treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

Concepts.definition: Progression; advancement in extent or severity.

Property.preferredName: Local Recurrent Neoplasm Post Previous Therapeutic Procedure Present
Property.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Occurring prior to something else.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.
The reemergence of a neoplasm after a period of remission.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
